parsed.plot: DEV: Rance's latent Mage-Gift exploded during bandit attack on Lisle—obliterated village, killed some attackers. Senta (unpartnered Companion, 3 years searching) found him in Gift-shock crater. Chose him despite his resistance. Evidence recovered: red robes hidden under bandit garb—organized attack, possibly cult, fled to Menmellith. Heading to Waystation, then Haven. PEND: Red-robed attackers may return; Gift type/scope unknown; villagers carried off before explosion—fate unclear.

entities.c: GIFT: Wild Mage-talent awakened—immense destructive power, uncontrolled, type uncertain (possibly Firestarting or raw magic). Channels burned open, severe Gift-shock. Commitment: testimony to Haven about attack. Carries bandit's blade wrapped in red robe hood as evidence.

White Companion mare, sapphire eyes, silver-white mane. Adult 3 years, unpartnered until now. STANCE-Rance: Chose him—bond formed, stabilizing his Gift/channels with unconditional love. Frustrated by his stubbornness but committed. Knows he caused Lisle's destruction (he doesn't fully accept this yet). Herding him to safety/Haven. Practical, occasionally indignant, wry humor.
Small Valdemar village near Karse/Rethwellan/Menmellith borders. STATUS: Obliterated—leveled by Rance's awakened Gift during bandit attack. Crater at epicenter, ash and charred foundations remain.

Organized group masquerading as bandits (red robes hidden under bandit garb). Attacked Lisle to capture villagers—purpose unknown. Fled toward Menmellith after Rance's Gift exploded. Possible cult/sect. May return to confirm attack success.
